package.name: linux-nopae
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.patch: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` cd linux-${major}.${minor} [ -f ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz ] && unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/lesslinux-fblogo-20100922.ppm drivers/video/logo/logo_linux_clut224.ppm cp -v ${SRCDIR}/config-3.16-nopae-lesslinux-20140815-1425 .config sed -i 's/lesslinux-000/lesslinux-nopae-000/g' .config echo 'CONFIG_ACPI_PROCFS_POWER=y' >> .config cd .. mv linux-${major}.${minor} linux-${PKGVERSION}
package.build: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} yes '' | make oldconfig make clean if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount bzImage CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else make -j 4 make -j 4 bzImage fi
package.install:
cd linux-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/boot INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${TGTDIR} make modules_install rm -rf ${TGTDIR}/lib/firmware install -m 0644 arch/x86/boot/bzImage ${TGTDIR}/boot/vmlinuz-${PKGVERSION}-lesslinux-nopae-000 find ${TGTDIR}/lib/modules/${PKGVERSION}-lesslinux-nopae-000 -type f -name '*.ko' -exec strip --strip-unneeded {} \;
true
